message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even considering its value to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, $12,000 is significantly below my bottom line. Could you do $17,000?
I understand that $12,000 is below your bottom line, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $14,000?
